attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to propose that all British football clubs must have at least 5 British football players in their first team squad.  I believe this would improve England, Ireland, Scotland and Wales as a team, give British children more chance of succeeding in football.

rejection.details: Please re-draft with a call to action in the petition title, and not your name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
